        Description copied from interface: MemoryUnit

      • setCapacity

        public void setCapacity(long capacity)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryUnit
        Updates the capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) of this MemoryUnit.

        The capacity difference is added or subtracted to/from the free capacity of this unit.

        A NotificationCodes.MU_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification is thrown.

        Specified by:
        setCapacity in interface MemoryUnit<Zone extends MemoryZone>

      • getFreeCapacity

        public long getFreeCapacity()
        Description copied from interface: MemoryUnit

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the total free capacity (in number of Simulator.BYTEs) on this memory unit

      • allocate

        public void allocate(long size)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryUnit
        Allocates the given size on the memory unit.
        You should not have to call this method directly. Throws a NotificationCodes.MU_FREE_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification.
        Specified by:
        allocate in interface MemoryUnit<Zone extends MemoryZone>
        Parameters:
        size - the size in number of Simulator.BYTEs

        public void free(long size)

        You should not have to call this method directly. Throws a NotificationCodes.MU_FREE_CAPACITY_CHANGED notification.

        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Adds a new children entity.
        This does not update the parent of the given entity.

        Note: You should not need to call this method, instead use EntityImpl.setParent(Entity).

        Specified by:

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(Entity entity)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Search for the given children entity and removes it.
        This does not update the parent property of the entity.

        Note: You should not need to call this method, instead use EntityImpl.setParent(Entity) with null parameter.

        Specified by:
        removeEntity in interface Entity
        Overrides:

      • findReplica

        public Zone findReplica(Zone zone)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryUnit
        Returns the first MemoryZone candidate that satisfies candidate.isReplicaOf(zone), or null.

        If the given zone's parent is the current memory unit, then it is returned directly.

        Specified by:
        findReplica in interface MemoryUnit<Zone extends MemoryZone>
        Returns:
        the first MemoryZone candidate that satisfies candidate.isReplicaOf(zone), or null
